name: GunMan: Space Head Hunter
description:
Welcome !

This is a classical side-scrolling shoot'em up in space with a look reminiscent of the 16bits area.

You can configure the controls !
You'll need 2 controllers, examples:

  • with the "classical QWERTY configuration": Keyboard WADS + Mouse, the keyboard move your ship, the mouse the turret.
  • with an AZERTY keyboard you may prefer QSDZ + Mouse
